original_text: Manasseh built again the altars on the hills that his father Hezekiah had knocked down. He built altars for people to worship idols of Baal. He also made Asherah poles. He bent down low to worship all the stars in the sky.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 히스기야가 헐어 버린 산당을 다시 세우며 바알들을 위하여 제단을 쌓으며 아세라 목상을 만들며 하늘의 모든 일월성신을 경배하여 섬기며

sentences.original_text: Manasseh built again the altars on the hills
sentences.korean_translation: 므낫세는 다시 산 위에 제단들을 쌓았습니다

sentences.original_text: that his father Hezekiah had knocked down
He built altars for people to worship idols of Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들이 바알 우상을 경배하게 할 제단들을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: He bent down low to worship all the stars in the sky
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하늘의 모든 별들을 경배하기 위해 몸을 낮추었습니다
